Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $1,400,000. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product, which I am confident will meet and exceed your expectations. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I aim to provide a fair and mutually beneficial transaction. Should you decide to accept this offer, I assure you of a smooth and efficient process. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
